table.name: shipment
table.description: Table (and associated tables of SHIPMENT_STOP, SHIPMENT_STOP_D, S_SHIP_UNIT_LINE, and S_SHIP_UNIT) was added in 2.5 to indicate what was actually shipped.  This module was added because in 2.1 if the quantity received was different than what was requested, the ORDER_RELEASE information got overwritten.  There was no way of comparing how accurate the actual shipments were to what was requested.  These tables look very similar to the tables associated with ORDER_RELEASE. The key to this table is SHIPMENT_GID, because there is one record for every actual shipment in this table.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_GID
columns.description: The GID for the shipment.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_XID
columns.description: The XID for the shipment.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_NAME
columns.description: A descriptive name of the shipment.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_MODE_GID
columns.description: A unique identifier to define the transportation modes.

columns.name: IS_TEMPLATE
columns.description: Indicates whether a shipment is a template.

columns.name: IS_PRIMARY
columns.description: Indicates if the shipment is the primary shipment related to an order (bookings) path.

columns.name: IS_SPOT_COSTED
columns.description: Y/N based on whether the shipment cost is a spot cost specified by the service provider during a spot bid/broadcast tender.

columns.name: IS_CREDIT_NOTE
columns.description: Y/N based on an associated credit note.

columns.name: CM_PREV_DEST_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The destination location of the previous shipment in the continuous move tour.

columns.name: CM_NEXT_SOURCE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The source location of the next shipment in the continuous move tour.

columns.name: TOTAL_ACTUAL_COST
columns.description: The total actual cost of the shipment.

columns.name: TOTAL_ACTUAL_COST_BASE
columns.description: The total actual cost in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHTED_COST
columns.description: The total weighted cost of the shipment considering any additional preference weighting to influence selection positive or negative.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHTED_COST_BASE
columns.description: The total weighted cost in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: T_ACTUAL_COST_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: A unique identifier to the currency that the actual cost is specified in.

columns.name: T_WEIGHTED_COST_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: A unique identifier to the currency that the weighted actual cost is specified in.

columns.name: TOTAL_TRANS_COST
columns.description: The total cost of the shipment. It represents the total transportation cost after applying the rebate.

columns.name: TOTAL_TRANS_COST_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency type for the total cost.

columns.name: TOTAL_TRANS_COST_BASE
columns.description: The total cost of the shipment, in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: LOADED_DISTANCE
columns.description: The total distance that the truck or the transportation mode will travel when the shipment is loaded.

columns.name: LOADED_DISTANCE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The load distance unit of measure.

columns.name: LOADED_DISTANCE_BASE
columns.description: The loaded distance in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: UNLOADED_DISTANCE
columns.description: The total distance that the truck or the transportation mode will travel when empty.

columns.name: UNLOADED_DISTANCE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The unloaded distance unit of measure.

columns.name: UNLOADED_DISTANCE_BASE
columns.description: The unloaded distance in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID of the source location of the shipment.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The GID of the destination location of the shipment.

columns.name: START_TIME
columns.description: The actual shipment start time. Initially it is the system expected start time. It is updated once the carrier actually starts the shipment.

columns.name: END_TIME
columns.description: The time the shipment is delivered. Initially this is the system expected delivery time. It is updated with the actual delivery time when the shipment is delivered.

columns.name: FREIGHT_TERMS
columns.description: The freight terms for the shipment, such as prepaid or collect.

columns.name: PARENT_LEG_GID
columns.description: The parent leg associated with the itinerary that may have been used to plan the shipment.

columns.name: VOYAGE_GID
columns.description: The voyage identifier associated with the shipment if this shipment is planned using a voyage that has been loaded into the voyage table.

columns.name: SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The service provider identifier associated with the shipment.

columns.name: RATE_OFFERING_GID
columns.description: The rate offering (contract) identifier that is used by the service provider moving this shipment.

columns.name: RATE_GEO_GID
columns.description: The detailed rate record (contract) identifier that is used by the service provider moving this shipment.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_SHIPMENT_GID
columns.description: If the shipment represents a secondary charge, this points back to the 'parent' shipment for which the secondary shipment is a 'child'.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The shipment group identifier if this shipment is placed into a single group.

columns.name: IS_AUTO_MERGE_CONSOLIDATE
columns.description: Y/N indicating if the auto merge consolidation rule was used from the itinerary when creating this shipment. (View Only)

columns.name: PERSPECTIVE
columns.description: The indicates if the shipment is a buy or sell perspective.

columns.name: FLIGHT_INSTANCE_ID
columns.description: The flight instance (date of flight) identifier associated with the shipment if this shipment is planned using a flight in the flight table.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT
columns.description: The total weight of the shipment.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total weight unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The total weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME
columns.description: The total volume of the shipment.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total volume unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The total volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_SHIP_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The total ship unit count of the shipment.

columns.name: TOTAL_PACKAGING_UNIT_COUNT
columns.description: The total packaging unit count of the shipment.

columns.name: TOTAL_ITEM_PACKAGE_COUNT
columns.description: The total item package count of the shipment.

columns.name: INTERMEDIARY_CORPORATION_GID
columns.description: The intermediary corporation identifier if this shipment is being managed by an additional party to the shipper and carrier relationship such as a 3PL corporation.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_TYPE_GID
columns.description: The shipment type associated with the shipment. This is a system value such as transport, secondary charge shipment, or non-freight related.

columns.name: ROUTE_CODE_COMBINATION_GID
columns.description: The route code combination identifier of the shipment used for specifying rail shipments.

columns.name: RAIL_INTER_MODAL_PLAN_GID
columns.description: The rail intermodal plan identifier of the shipment used for intermodal rail shipments.

columns.name: CUSTOMER_RATE_CODE
columns.description: The customer rate identifier associated with the shipment if this shipment is planned using a customer.

columns.name: COFC_TOFC
columns.description: The trailer or flat car or the container on flat car code for rail shipments.

columns.name: RAIL_RETURN_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The rail return location identifier of the rail shipment.

columns.name: RAIL_RETURN_ROUTE_GID
columns.description: The rail return route identifier of the rail shipment.

columns.name: RULE_11_INDICATOR
columns.description: The rule 11 indicator of the shipment used for managing rail.

columns.name: CURRENT_STOP_NUM
columns.description: The stop number within the shipment. Stop number = 1 is the pickup stop, and the max (stop number) for a shipment is the delivery stop.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_AS_WORK
columns.description: Indicates the shipment as work.

columns.name: SECONDARY_CHARGE_RULE_GID
columns.description: The secondary charge rule identifier that was used to generate the shipment if this is a secondary charge shipment.

columns.name: CHECK_TIME_CONSTRAINT
columns.description: The indicator to check the time constraints associated with the shipment.

columns.name: CHECK_COST_CONSTRAINT
columns.description: The indicator to check cost constraints associated with the shipment

columns.name: CHECK_CAPACITY_CONSTRAINT
columns.description: The indicator to check the capacity constraints associated with the shipment.

columns.name: CM_NAME
columns.description: The shipment GID of the first shipment in the tour. If the continuous move tour is received as input, this is the supplied tour ID.

columns.name: CM_SEQUENCE_NUM
columns.description: Indicates the shipment's sequence in the continuous move tour.

columns.name: CM_COST
columns.description: The shipment cost when the shipment is part of a continuous move tour.

columns.name: CM_COST_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the continuous move cost of the continuous move tour.

columns.name: CM_COST_BASE
columns.description: The continuous move cost in the base currency.

columns.name: CM_EMPTY_DISTANCE
columns.description: The empty leg distance between previous and this shipments.

columns.name: CM_EMPTY_DISTANCE_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The continuous move empty distance of the shipment unit of measure.

columns.name: CM_EMPTY_DISTANCE_BASE
columns.description: The continuous move empty distance of the shipment in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: HAZMAT_MODE_GID
columns.description: The hazmat mode identifier that is associated with the shipment.

columns.name: HAZMAT_REGION_GID
columns.description: The hazmat region identifier that is associated with the shipment.

columns.name: WEIGH_CODE
columns.description: The weigh code of the shipment that identifies the weight type.

columns.name: RULE_7
columns.description: A Y/N indicator from the shipper to the carrier that the shipper is not liable for freight charges.

columns.name: SHIPMENT_RELEASED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator used for rail shipments that indicate that the shipment is ready.

columns.name: PROCESSING_CODE_GID
columns.description: The processing code GID.

columns.name: AIR_RAIL_ROUTE_CODE
columns.description: A transportation mode code that is informational for the shipment.

columns.name: PAYMENT_METHOD_CODE_GID
columns.description: The payment method code identifier.

columns.name: INCO_TERM_GID
columns.description: The Incoterm identifier associated with the shipment.

columns.name: DIM_WEIGHT
columns.description: The dimensional weight that was calculated for the shipment when using the dimensional rating (DIM) factor.

columns.name: DIM_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The dimensional weight that was calculated for the shipment unit of measure.

columns.name: DIM_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The dimensional weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: PLANNED_COST
columns.description: The cost when the original shipment was created.

columns.name: PLANNED_COST_BASE
columns.description: The planned cost in the base currency.

columns.name: PLANNED_COST_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the planned cost of the shipment.

columns.name: TERM_LOCATION_TEXT
columns.description: The term location text that is informational for the shipment.

columns.name: TARIFF_ORGANIZATION_NUMBER
columns.description: The tariff organization number, for informational purposes.

columns.name: TARIFF_ORGANIZATION_NAME
columns.description: The tariff organization name, for informational purposes.

columns.name: TARIFF_NAME
columns.description: The tariff name, for informational purposes.

columns.name: TARIFF_NUMBER
columns.description: The tariff number, for informational purposes.

columns.name: TARIFF_DATE
columns.description: The tariff date, for informational purposes.

columns.name: IS_HAZARDOUS
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying that the shipment is identified as having hazardous material.

columns.name: IS_TEMPERATURE_CONTROL
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying that the shipment is identified as needing temperature control.

columns.name: IS_COST_FIXED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator that identifies the shipment having fixed cost that will not be recalculated if the shipment is modified.

columns.name: IS_SERVICE_TIME_FIXED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator that identifies the shipment having fixed service time that will not be recalculated if the shipment is modified.

columns.name: IS_RATE_GEO_FIXED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator that the rate detail (rate geo) has been fixed by the user and will not be reassigned if the shipment is modified.

columns.name: IS_RATE_OFFERING_FIXED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator that the rate offering has been fixed by the user and will not be reassigned.

columns.name: IS_SERVPROV_FIXED
columns.description: A Y/N indicator that the service provider has been fixed by the user and will not be reassigned.

columns.name: IS_PRELOAD
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying that the shipment is pre-load prior to carrier arriving for transport.

columns.name: IS_FIXED_TENDER_CONTACT
columns.description: A Y/N indicator that the tender contact individual has been fixed by the user and will not be reassigned.

columns.name: IS_TO_BE_HELD
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying that the shipment is to be held by the carrier.

columns.name: IS_PREFERRED_CARRIER
columns.description: Indicates if the carrier selected for the shipment is preferred.

columns.name: IS_EQUIPMENT_FIXED
columns.description: Checks if a service provider can update the equipment number and equipment initials when accepting a tendered shipment.

columns.name: IS_RECALC_TOTALS
columns.description: Turns on/off totaling logic.

columns.name: HAS_APPOINTMENTS
columns.description: Indicates if any stops on the shipment have appointments.

columns.name: INDICATOR
columns.description: A settable indicator for the shipment.

columns.name: CONTACT_GID
columns.description: The contact identifier linking in the contact table information to the shipment.

columns.name: BULK_PLAN_GID
columns.description: If the shipment was planned via the bulk plan process, then this is the global identifier for the bulk plan.

columns.name: TOTAL_NUM_REFERENCE_UNITS
columns.description: The total number of reference units of the shipment as defined by the equipment reference units.

columns.name: ITINERARY_GID
columns.description: The itinerary identifier that was used to build the shipment if it was built with the planning logic.

columns.name: FEASIBILITY_CODE_GID
columns.description: The feasibility code associated with the shipment can identify shipment infeasibilities.

columns.name: NUM_ORDER_RELEASES
columns.description: The number of order releases that are on this shipment.

columns.name: NUM_STOPS
columns.description: The number of shipment stop records related to this shipment.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_WEIGHT
columns.description: The total net weight of all the freight on the shipment as summed with the shipment ship unit lines net weight.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total net weight unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The total net weight in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_VOLUME
columns.description: The total net volume of all the freight on the shipment as summed with the shipment ship unit lines net volume.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The total net volume unit of measure.

columns.name: TOTAL_NET_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The total net volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: EARLIEST_START_TIME
columns.description: The earliest start time that will make this shipment feasible.

columns.name: LATEST_START_TIME
columns.description: The latest start time that will make this shipment feasible.

columns.name: LAST_EVENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: The last event group identifier specifies the event group code of the last tracking event that was received against the shipment.

columns.name: REPETITION_SCHEDULE_GID
columns.description: The repetition schedule associated with the shipment if the shipment was built utilizing a repetition schedule.

columns.name: IN_TRAILER_BUILD
columns.description: Indicates that this shipment is in a trailer build shipment group.

columns.name: FIRST_EQUIPMENT_GROUP_GID
columns.description: A shipment can contain multiple equipment records. This value is associated to the first equipment group defined for the shipment.

columns.name: BULK_CM_GID
columns.description: The identifier for the bulk continuous move if the shipment was selected in the bulk continuous move process.

columns.name: VESSEL_GID
columns.description: The vessel that the shipment is on. If populated, this actually overrides the value that is in the voyage table.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED1_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five user-defined image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED2_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five user-defined image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED3_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five user-defined image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED4_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five user-defined image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: USER_DEFINED5_ICON_GID
columns.description: The GID for the user defined image/icon. Up to five user-defined image fields can be configured to appear on the Search and Results page that let you query and review the images that are assigned to a business object. Images can be assigned to business objects to visually emphasize certain characteristics such as shipments containing hazardous material, orders for hot commodities, or shipments with over dimensional freight.

columns.name: SOURCE_LOCATION_OVERRIDE_GID
columns.description: The location identifier that will override the source location that is defined for the shipment.

columns.name: DEST_LOCATION_OVERRIDE_GID
columns.description: The location identifier that will override the destination location that is defined for the shipment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_REFERENCE_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The equipment reference unit GID that is associated with the equipment reference unit utilization of the shipment.

columns.name: SCHEDULE_TYPE
columns.description: When the schedule type is populated, it is a consol.

columns.name: WEIGHT_UTILIZATION
columns.description: The weight utilization of the shipment as defined by the weight of the freight and the maximum capacity of the equipment.

columns.name: VOLUME_UTILIZATION
columns.description: The volume utilization of the shipment as defined by the volume of the freight and the maximum capacity of the equipment.

columns.name: EQUIP_REF_UNIT_UTILIZATION
columns.description: The equipment reference utilization of the shipment as defined by the equipment reference unit amount of the freight and the maximum capacity of the equipment.

columns.name: JOB_GID
columns.description: The job GID identifier of the shipment, if the shipment is assigned to a job.

columns.name: PORT_OF_LOAD_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location ID of the port of load for the primary leg carrier.

columns.name: PORT_OF_LOAD_OVERRIDE_LOC_GID
columns.description: The location override ID of the port of load for the primary leg carrier.

columns.name: PORT_OF_DIS_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location ID of the port of discharge for the primary leg carrier.

columns.name: PORT_OF_DIS_OVERRIDE_LOC_GID
columns.description: The location override ID of the port of discharge for the primary leg carrier.

columns.name: INSURANCE_POLICY_NUMBER
columns.description: The insurance policy number that covers this shipment, for informational purposes.

columns.name: INSURANCE_AMOUNT
columns.description: The insurance amount of the shipment.

columns.name: INSURANCE_AMOUNT_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The insurance amount currency GID of the shipment.

columns.name: INSURANCE_AMOUNT_BASE
columns.description: The insurance amount in the base currency.

columns.name: INSURANCE_PREMIUM
columns.description: The insurance premium of the shipment, for informational purposes.

columns.name: INSURANCE_PREMIUM_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The insurance premium currency GID of the shipment.

columns.name: INSURANCE_PREMIUM_BASE
columns.description: The insurance premium in the base currency.

columns.name: BOL_TYPE
columns.description: The bill of lading type defined for the shipment, used for report management.

columns.name: BOL_ISSUANCE_TYPE
columns.description: The bill of lading issuance type identifier.

columns.name: CONSOL_GID
columns.description: The consol identifier if the shipment has been built from a consol structure.

columns.name: PLACE_RECEIPT_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The place receipt location identifier specifying the location where ownership of freight starts.

columns.name: PLACE_DELIVER_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The place deliver location identifier specifying the location where ownership of freight ends with delivery.

columns.name: SAIL_DATE
columns.description: The sail date of the shipment that is populated if the shipment utilizes the vessel schedules.

columns.name: RAIL_DATE
columns.description: The rail date of the shipment that is populated if the shipment utilizes the rail schedules.

columns.name: SAIL_CUTOFF_DATE
columns.description: The sail cutoff (date of sail) identifier associated with the shipment if this shipment is planned using a sail on the sail table.

columns.name: PORT_DISCHARGE_ETA
columns.description: The estimated port of discharge date associated with ocean-going shipments.

columns.name: PORT_OF_EXIT_DATE
columns.description: The estimated port of exit (for international shipments) associated with ocean going shipments.

columns.name: PORT_EXIT_LOC_GID
columns.description: The designated port the freight will be exiting the country for international shipments.

columns.name: CONTAINER_DELIVERY_LOC_GID
columns.description: The container delivery location identifier establishing where the ocean going container will be delivered after unloading freight.

columns.name: CONTAINER_PICKUP_LOC_GID
columns.description: The container pickup location identifier establishing where the ocean-going container will be picked up prior to loading with freight.

columns.name: NFRC_RULE_GID
columns.description: The NFRC (non freight related charge) rule that was used to generate the shipment if the shipment is a NFRC type of shipment.

columns.name: IS_CPCTY_OVERRIDE_APPLICABLE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying if the capacity override is applicable where capacity defines the resource a service provider has available for assignment.

columns.name: PLANNED_RATE_OFFERING_GID
columns.description: The initial planned rate offering ID. It is set when shipment initially gets planned. It will not be changed thereafter.

columns.name: PLANNED_TRANSPORT_MODE_GID
columns.description: The initial planned transport mode ID. It is set when shipment initially gets planned. It will not be changed thereafter.

columns.name: PLANNED_SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The initial planned service provider ID. It is set when shipment initially gets planned. It will not be changed thereafter.

columns.name: PLANNED_RATE_GEO_GID
columns.description: The initial planned rate record ID. It is set when shipment initially gets planned. It will not be changed thereafter.

columns.name: IS_PERMANENT
columns.description: Set this flag to 'Y' if the shipment should not be automatically deleted as a result of unassign/merge/split action. In this case, the shipment should be specifically deleted in 'delete shipment' action.

columns.name: IS_MEMO_BL
columns.description: Indicate how to handle B/L. Y: no bill of lading generated for this shipment. N: bill of lading generated for this shipment.

columns.name: DUTY_PAID
columns.description: The duty paid of the shipment.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_DATE
columns.description: Indicates the date to be used for any currency conversions; if null, the latest conversion should be used.

columns.name: CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: Indicates the currency to be used for cost totals; if null, the first shipment cost of type base will dictate the currency.

columns.name: EXCHANGE_RATE_GID
columns.description: Indicates the set of exchange rates to use for currency conversions; if null, the default set should be used.

columns.name: TOT_MATCHED_INVOICE_COST
columns.description: The total matched invoice cost associated with the shipment after the match and pay process runs in freight payment.

columns.name: TOT_MATCHED_INV_COST_CURR_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the total matched invoice cost.

columns.name: TOT_MATCHED_INVOICE_COST_BASE
columns.description: The total matched invoice cost in the base currency.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_INVOICE_COST
columns.description: The original invoice cost at the point when the invoice was initially created or matched to the shipment.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_INVOICE_COST_CURR_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the original invoice cost.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_INVOICE_COST_BASE
columns.description: The original invoice cost in the base currency.

columns.name: TOTAL_APPROVED_COST
columns.description: The total approved cost associated with the shipment after the approval step in the freight payment process.

columns.name: TOTAL_APPROVED_COST_CURR_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the total approved invoice cost.

columns.name: TOTAL_APPROVED_COST_BASE
columns.description: The total approved cost in the base currency.

columns.name: SOURCE_PIER_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The source operational location.

columns.name: DEST_PIER_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The destination operational location.

columns.name: PRIMARY_ORDER_BASE_GID
columns.description: A shipment can contain multiple orders and these orders can refer to multiple order bases. The bill to party of an order base is carried forward to the shipment. This field reflects the order base identifier that was used to establish this value.

columns.name: TOTAL_DECLARED_VALUE
columns.description: The total declared value of the goods on the shipment. This is the sum of the declared values of the shipment ship unit lines.

columns.name: TOTAL_DECLARED_VALUE_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the total declared value.

columns.name: TOTAL_DECLARED_VALUE_BASE
columns.description: The total declared value in the base currency.

columns.name: IS_PROFIT_SPLIT
columns.description: Indicates if the NFRC shipment will be profit split.

columns.name: SHIPPING_AGENT_CONTACT_GID
columns.description: Indicate if this NFRC is created from the Assign Shipping Agent action on the job.

columns.name: IS_ADVANCED_CHARGE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying that this NFRC shipment is built as an advanced charge.

columns.name: LOAD_CONFIG_ENGINE_TYPE_GID
columns.description: Null type means no load configuration is performed on the shipment.

columns.name: APPOINTMENT_PRIORITY_GID
columns.description: The appointment priority identifier associated with the shipment.

columns.name: IS_FIXED_DISTANCE
columns.description: Boolean, defaults to N. When set to Y, this flag indicates a user-entered value for the total loaded distance field.

columns.name: DELIVERING_SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The service provider who is the delivering service provider for this shipment.

columns.name: ORIGINATING_SERVPROV_GID
columns.description: The service provider who is the originating service provider for this shipment.

columns.name: CHARGEABLE_WEIGHT
columns.description: The dimensional weight as determined by the rating process.

columns.name: CHARGEABLE_WEIGHT_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The chargeable weight unit of measure.

columns.name: CHARGEABLE_WEIGHT_BASE
columns.description: The chargeable weight (date of chargeable) identifier associated with the shipment if this shipment is planned using a chargeable on the chargeable table.

columns.name: CM_COST_FN
columns.description: The continuous move cost specified if the shipment is part of a continuous move tour.

columns.name: CM_COST_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the functional continuous move cost.

columns.name: TOTAL_ACTUAL_C_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the total actual cost.

columns.name: TOTAL_ACTUAL_C_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the functional actual cost.

columns.name: TOTAL_TRANS_C_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the functional continuous move cost.

columns.name: TOTAL_TRANS_C_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the functional continuous move cost.

columns.name: TOTAL_WT_COST_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the total weighted cost.

columns.name: TOTAL_WT_COST_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the functional total weighted cost.

columns.name: PLANNED_COST_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the planned cost.

columns.name: PLANNED_COST_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the functional planned cost.

columns.name: INSURANCE_AMT_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the insurance amount.

columns.name: INSURANCE_AMT_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the insurance amount.

columns.name: INSURANCE_PREM_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for insurance premium.

columns.name: INSURANCE_PREM_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the functional insurance premium.

columns.name: TOT_MATCH_INV_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for total matched invoice cost.

columns.name: TOT_MATCH_INV_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the functional total matched invoice cost.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_INV_C_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for the functional original cost.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_INV_C_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the functional original cost.

columns.name: TOTAL_APP_COST_FN
columns.description: The functional currency amount for total approved cost.

columns.name: TOTAL_APP_COST_FN_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: The currency identifier for the functional total approved cost.

columns.name: FIXED_SERVICE_DAYS
columns.description: The fixed number of service days, if returned by the rating engine.

columns.name: SIGHTING_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location where the shipment was last sighted.

columns.name: SIGHTING_DATE
columns.description: The date and time when the shipment was last sighted at the sighting location.

columns.name: PREV_SIGHTING_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location identifier for the previous sighting location used for rail shipment and tracking events.

columns.name: PREV_SIGHTING_DATE
columns.description: The date associated with the previous sighting location and in the tracking event.

columns.name: DRIVER_GID
columns.description: The driver or primary team driver assigned to the shipment.

columns.name: SECONDARY_DRIVER_GID
columns.description: The secondary team driver assigned to the shipment.

columns.name: POWER_UNIT_GID
columns.description: The power unit assigned to the shipment.

columns.name: MARKED_FOR_PURGE
columns.description: A Boolean field. When it is set to 'Y', this row and its child data will be purged.

columns.name: DRIVER_ASSIGN_BULK_PLAN_GID
columns.description: Fleet bulk plan ID for driver assignment.

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_ASSIGN_BULK_PLAN_GID
columns.description: Fleet bulk plan ID for equipment assignment.

columns.name: PREV_DROP_INVENTORY_PROCESSED
columns.description: Indicates fleet equipment inventory processing for driver's previous shipment's equipment.

columns.name: PICK_INVENTORY_PROCESSED
columns.description: Indicates fleet equipment inventory processing for picking an empty equipment before freight.

columns.name: DROP_INVENTORY_PROCESSED
columns.description: Indicates fleet equipment inventory processing for dropping an empty equipment after freight.

columns.name: DIM_VOLUME
columns.description: The dimensional volume. Mathematical weight equivalence according to specified dim rate factor.

columns.name: DIM_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The dimensional volume unit of measure.

columns.name: DIM_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The dimensional volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: CHARGEABLE_VOLUME
columns.description: The actual volume used in calculating the cost of the shipment.

columns.name: CHARGEABLE_VOLUME_UOM_CODE
columns.description: The chargeable volume unit of measure.

columns.name: CHARGEABLE_VOLUME_BASE
columns.description: The chargeable volume in the base unit of measure.

columns.name: DOMAIN_NAME
columns.description: The database domain where this data is stored.

columns.name: INSERT_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data insert user.

columns.name: INSERT_DATE
columns.description: The date and time of data insert.

columns.name: UPDATE_USER
columns.description: The user ID of the data update user.

columns.name: UPDATE_DATE
columns.description: Date and time of the most recent data update.

columns.name: PLANNING_PARAMETER_SET_GID
columns.description: The parameter set GID which is used in building this shipment.

columns.name: NUM_EQUIPMENT_ORDERED
columns.description: The number of equipment ordered. This is manually set by the user and can be rated on.

columns.name: EM_PHONE_NUMBER
columns.description: The emergency phone number when shipping hazardous materials. The 24 hours contact for the shipment.

columns.name: PARCEL_ZONE
columns.description: The ship to mail zone. A price key used for parcel rate calculations.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_CURRENCY1_GID
columns.description: The attribute currency1 (date of attribute) identifier associated with the shipment if this shipment is planned using an attribute on the attribute table.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_CURRENCY1_BASE
columns.description: The attribute currency1 (date of attribute) identifier associated with the shipment if this shipment is planned using an attribute on the attribute table.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_CURRENCY2
columns.description: The attribute currency of the shipment.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_CURRENCY2_GID
columns.description: The attribute currency2 (date of attribute) identifier associated with the shipment if this shipment is planned using an attribute on the attribute table.

columns.name: ATTRIBUTE_CURRENCY2_BASE
columns.description: The attribute currency2 (date of attribute) identifier associated with the shipment if this shipment is planned using an attribute on the attribute table.

columns.name: COMBINATION_EQUIP_GRP_GID
columns.description: The equipment group associated with the shipment if the shipment contains combination trailers or combination compartments.

columns.name: SI_CUTOFF_DATE
columns.description: The shippers instruction cutoff date associated with the shipment.

columns.name: CFS_CUTOFF_DATE
columns.description: The container freight station cutoff date associated with the shipment.

columns.name: SRC_ARB_LEVEL_OF_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The source arbitrary level of service identifier if the shipment is built using a rate that has arbitrary values. In this case the shipment will identify the rate service used for the main leg and this will be the service of the source arbitrary part.

columns.name: DEST_ARB_LEVEL_OF_SERVICE_GID
columns.description: The destination arbitrary level of service identifier if the shipment is built using a rate that has arbitrary values. In this case the shipment will identify the rate service used for the main leg and this will be the service of the destination arbitrary part.

columns.name: CFS_LOCATION_GID
columns.description: The location identifier for the container freight station.

columns.name: IS_FIXED_VOYAGE
columns.description: A Y/N indicator specifying if the voyage part of the shipment is to remain fixed on updates.

columns.name: WORK_ASSIGNMENT_BULK_PLAN_GID
columns.description: Work assignment bulk plan ID which is generated during work assignment bulk plan process.

columns.name: AHEAD_LATE_TIME
columns.description: shipment status

columns.name: AHEAD_OR_LATE
columns.description: A - Ahead of Schedule O - On Time L - Late T - Tardy - This can mean a degree of lateness depending on the user.  B - Bad Order H - Held N - No Bill Y - Constructive Placed Z - Actual Placed

columns.name: ETA_DATE
columns.description: Estimated time of arrival

columns.name: FIRST_EQUIPMENT_INITIAL
columns.description: first equipment intial

columns.name: FIRST_EQUIPMENT_NUMBER
columns.description: first equipment number

columns.name: SOLE_PACKAGED_ITEM_GID
columns.description: only one equipment and with only one item

columns.name: REPORTED_BS_STATUS_CODE
columns.description: latest reported event for shipment

columns.name: REPORTING_SCAC
columns.description: reporting scac

columns.name: EQUIPMENT_DESTINATION
columns.description: equipment destination

columns.name: PREV_REPORTED_BS_STATUS_CODE
columns.description: previous reported event for shipment

columns.name: PREV_REPORTING_SCAC
columns.description: previous reporting scac

columns.name: PREV_EQUIPMENT_DESTINATION
columns.description: previous equipment destination

columns.name: MAX_NUM_RETENDER
columns.description: Maximum number of re-tenders.

columns.name: RESERVATION_NUM
columns.description: Saved here to search shipments based on Reservation Number.

columns.name: IS_AR_ROUTE_CODE_FIXED
columns.description: This flag is for rail route code on shipment to allow or restrict cost/rail route code updates.

columns.name: WAYBILL_DATE
columns.description: Waybill date represents contractual agreement of the carriage.

columns.name: PROJECTED_TOUR_NAME
columns.description: Represents the identifier for the projected tour. If the projected tour is received as input, this is the supplied tour ID.

columns.name: PROJECTED_TOUR_SEQUENCE_NUM
columns.description: Represents the sequence in which the shipment should appear in the projected tour.

columns.name: EXTERNAL_VOYAGE_CODE
columns.description: Specifies the number of the voyage as assigned by the carrier that transports the shipment.

columns.name: PLANNED_CO2_EMISSION
columns.description: CO2 emissions recorded while planning the shipment.

columns.name: PLANNED_CO2_EMISSION_UOM
columns.description: Unit of Measure for the planned CO2 emissions.

columns.name: PLANNED_CO2_EMISSION_BASE
columns.description: Planned CO2 emissions in base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_CO2_EMISSION
columns.description: Actual CO2 emissions for the shipment.

columns.name: ACTUAL_CO2_EMISSION_UOM
columns.description: Unit of Measure for the actual CO2 emissions.

columns.name: ACTUAL_CO2_EMISSION_BASE
columns.description: Actual CO2 emissions in base unit of measure.

columns.name: PLANNED_CO2_EQ_EMISSION
columns.description: CO2 equivalent emissions recorded while planning the shipment.

columns.name: PLANNED_CO2_EQ_EMISSION_UOM
columns.description: Unit of Measure for the planned CO2 equivalent emissions.

columns.name: PLANNED_CO2_EQ_EMISSION_BASE
columns.description: Planned CO2 equivalent emissions in base unit of measure.

columns.name: ACTUAL_CO2_EQ_EMISSION
columns.description: Actual CO2 equivalent emissions for the shipment.

columns.name: ACTUAL_CO2_EQ_EMISSION_UOM
columns.description: Unit of Measure for the actual CO2 equivalent emissions.

columns.name: ACTUAL_CO2_EQ_EMISSION_BASE
columns.description: Actual CO2 equivalent emissions in base unit of measure.

columns.name: MARKET_COST
columns.description: Market cost based on the shipment.

columns.name: MARKET_COST_BASE
columns.description: Market cost based on the shipment in base units.

columns.name: MARKET_COST_CURRENCY_GID
columns.description: Units of measure for the market cost.

columns.name: LOADING_HALL_PENALTY
columns.description: The loading hall penalty used while building loading halls for the shipment.

columns.name: WORK_ASSIGNMENT_GID
columns.description: The ID of the Work Assignment of which the shipment is part of.
